title: Revolt LF ADC Plat+
body:
Hi Guys,

Revolt are currently looking for an ADC Main. We are looking for a player who has extensive knowledge about how play multiple situations ( lane swaps, roaming support, certain matchups)

We are after a player who is preferably Platinum and higher.

We play from Sunday- Thursday 8-12

We use TS also which is the preferred method for everyone.

Please post or add me if you believe you fit!
